title: Glimpses of China
brief_description: Gives glimpses of life in China and takes a more detailed look at four major cities- Xian, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou (Canton). Each place shows a part of China as it is today- infinitely varied rapidly changing and a fascinating land of contrasts.
